Title: Requires the city board of the city of New York to conduct votes regarding school plans in the county in which the school is located
Summary: Requires the city board of the city of New York to conduct votes regarding school plans in the county in which the school is located.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the city board of the city of New York to conduct votes regarding school plans in the county in which the school is located
